A human-readable rendering of the Oral Health Claim
"},"identifier":[{"system":"http://happyvalley.com/claim","value":"VRmLCURg0gSmhV"}],"status":"active","type":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/claim-type","code":"oral"}]},"use":"claim","patient":{"reference":"Patient/1"},"created":"2014-08-16","insurer":{"reference":"Organization/2"},"provider":{"reference":"Organization/1"},"priority":{"coding":[{"code":"normal"}]},"payee":{"type":{"coding":[{"code":"provider"}]}},"careTeam":[{"sequence":1,"provider":{"reference":"Practitioner/example"}}],"diagnosis":[{"sequence":1,"diagnosisCodeableConcept":{"coding":[{"code":"123456"}]}}],"insurance":[{"sequence":1,"focal":true,"identifier":{"system":"http://happyvalley.com/claim","value":"mrsPEYYycuf9"},"coverage":{"reference":"Coverage/9876B1"}}],"item":[{"sequence":1,"careTeamSequence":[1],"productOrService":{"coding":[{"code":"1200"}]},"servicedDate":"2014-08-16","unitPrice":{"value":12122,"currency":"USD"},"net":{"value":47245,"currency":"USD"}}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"ccpJg40XSB0q2R7"}]}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: care-team
parameters.description: Member of the CareTeam

parameters.name: created
parameters.description: The creation date for the Claim

parameters.name: detail-udi
parameters.description: UDI associated with a line item, detail product or service

parameters.name: encounter
parameters.description: Encounters associated with a billed line item

parameters.name: enterer
parameters.description: The party responsible for the entry of the Claim

parameters.name: facility
parameters.description: Facility where the products or services have been or will be provided

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The primary identifier of the financial resource

parameters.name: insurer
parameters.description: The target payor/insurer for the Claim

parameters.name: item-udi
parameters.description: UDI associated with a line item product or service

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Patient receiving the products or services

parameters.name: payee
parameters.description: The party receiving any payment for the Claim

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Processing priority requested

parameters.name: procedure-udi
parameters.description: UDI associated with a procedure

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Provider responsible for the Claim

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the Claim instance.

parameters.name: subdetail-udi
parameters.description: UDI associated with a line item, detail, subdetail product or service

parameters.name: use
parameters.description: The kind of financial resource
